text: Passing expressions to functions in python?

childList.text: How do i get the values passed to == from inside the function?

text: Edit: I'm trying to achieve something like this

code:
>>> def magic(left, op, right):
 ...    print(left+" "+op+" "+right)

 >>> magic(5 == 5)
 5 == 5
